suppress.notes: The entire app uses a centralized `Yaml` instance that is set up to use `SafeConstructor`, so this vulnerability does not apply here (`SafeConstructor` does not instantiate arbitrary classes).
google-http-client-protobuf misidentified as protobuf-java, which is actually in non-vulnerable version 3.21.10
gdx-jnigen-loader misidentified as a screenshot upload bash script available on GitHub that had an URL predictability vulnerability
The vulnerability is about `XML.toJSONObject` which isn't used here
